name: Confucius
description: Chinese philosopher and founder of Confucianism.

name: Lao Tzu
description: Ancient philosopher and founder of Taoism.

name: Qin Shi Huang
description: First emperor of a unified China.

name: Han Gaozu (Liu Bang)
description: Founder and first emperor of the Han Dynasty.

name: Sima Qian
description: Historian of the Han Dynasty, author of 'Records of the Grand Historian'.

name: Zhang Heng
description: Scientist and astronomer of the Han Dynasty.

name: Zhuge Liang
description: Military strategist of the Three Kingdoms period.

name: Li Bai
description: Famous poet of the Tang Dynasty.

name: Anji Tea
description: Tea popular during the Tang Dynasty.

name: Guan Yu
description: General of the Three Kingdoms period, revered as a god of war.

name: Su Shi
description: Poet and statesman of the Song Dynasty.

name: Zhu Yuanzhang (Hongwu Emperor)
description: Founder of the Ming Dynasty.

name: Yongle (Zhu Di)
description: Ming emperor known for his military expeditions and construction of the Forbidden City.

name: Kangxi (Kangxi Emperor)
description: Longest-reigning emperor of the Qing Dynasty.

name: Qianlong (Qianlong Emperor)
description: Qing emperor noted for cultural achievements and military campaigns.

name: Lin Zexiu
description: Official known for his role in the First Opium War.

name: Hong Xiuquan
description: Leader of the Taiping Rebellion.

name: Li Hongzhang
description: Qing statesman involved in modernizing China.

name: Su Manshow
description: Renowned Chinese poet and essayist.

name: Qi Baishi
description: Famous Chinese painter of the 20th century.

name: Mao Zedong
description: Leader of the People's Republic of China and the Communist Party.

name: Zhou Enlai
description: First Premier of the People's Republic of China.

name: Hu Yaobang
description: Reformist leader in China in the late 20th century.

name: Cao Cao
description: Warlord and poet of the Three Kingdoms period.

name: Yan Zhenqing
description: Noted calligrapher of the Tang Dynasty.

name: Wang Anshi
description: Reformer and politician of the Song Dynasty.

name: Li Yuan
description: Founder of the Tang Dynasty.

name: Li Shimin
description: Second emperor of the Tang Dynasty, known as Emperor Taizong.

name: Gaozong
description: Tang emperor and husband of Wu Zetian.

name: Xuanzang
description: Buddhist monk who traveled to India to retrieve sacred texts.

name: Wu Zetian
description: Only female emperor in Chinese history, during the Tang Dynasty.

name: An Lushan
description: Military general who led the An Lushan Rebellion.

name: Shi Siming
description: Ally of An Lushan and a leader in the An Lushan Rebellion.

name: Emperor Ai of Tang
description: The last emperor of the Tang Dynasty.

name: Emperor Taizu of Song
description: Founder of the Song Dynasty.

name: Zhu Xi
description: Philosopher who developed Neo-Confucianism during the Song Dynasty.

name: Emperor Huizong of Song
description: Song emperor known for his patronage of the arts.

name: Kublai Khan
description: Mongol ruler who founded the Yuan Dynasty.
